item.title: Install Raspberry
item.description: Table of Contents Advance Preparation Let’s Start ! Step 1. Install Raspberry Pi OS using Raspberry Pi Imager Step 2. Choose OS & SD card then write to SD card Step 3. Install Packages Refer Docs Advance Preparation Raspberry Device OS image SD Card HTMI to VGA、Power Code、Mouse、Keyboard… etc. Let’s Start ! Step 1.
